overview: From 2025-10-22 to 2025-10-23, Sendo-labs/frontend had 2 new PRs (2 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: new pages
topPRs.author: Neysixx
topPRs.body:
This pull request refactors several main pages (`analyzer`, `leaderboard`, `worker`, and the new `onboarding` page) to use a shared layout component, `PageWrapper`, for consistent styling and structure. It also introduces a new onboarding flow and makes minor improvements to the contact section. These changes improve code maintainability, visual consistency, and user onboarding experience.

**Shared Layout Refactor:**

* Replaced custom layout wrappers in `src/app/analyzer/client.tsx`, `src/app/leaderboard/client.tsx`, and `src/app/worker/client.tsx` with the shared `PageWrapper` component, ensuring consistent page structure and reducing duplicated code. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-5eada83b5857ea3eb390602cfbb8443939c66c9d28f234197efbc52b20d49d62R20) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-5eada83b5857ea3eb390602cfbb8443939c66c9d28f234197efbc52b20d49d62L249-R250) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-5eada83b5857ea3eb390602cfbb8443939c66c9d28f234197efbc52b20d49d62L342-R342) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-864779a54a15fad503964336872e4073b35db1c668f43f327e7fdca7b2391c62R9) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-864779a54a15fad503964336872e4073b35db1c668f43f327e7fdca7b2391c62L180-R181) [[6]](diffhunk://#diff-864779a54a15fad503964336872e4073b35db1c668f43f327e7fdca7b2391c62L358-R358) [[7]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34R21) [[8]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L171-R172) [[9]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L277) [[10]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L290-R289)

**Onboarding Flow Addition:**

* Added a new onboarding page (`src/app/onboarding/client.tsx` and `src/app/onboarding/page.tsx`) with a step-by-step guide, rewards system explanation, and calls-to-action for new contributors. This page uses `PageWrapper` for layout consistency. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-2f2cf00dbe4930b1bbc02139a05dce3b2f4ce7c4955d775f375c26f7d2a5eb89R1-R396) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-5ff8336f9c23d713d14e7d213695092f92f81381421e6d128e24857d5f8b0f3aR1-R22)

**Contact Section UI Update:**

* Updated the `ContactSection` component to adjust section height, padding, and heading sizes for improved visual balance and responsiveness. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-b6d289b33b9a10f149dbf2d4bd001c64c559cb4e3e16ae3b33df67879d264373L1-R1) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-b6d289b33b9a10f149dbf2d4bd001c64c559cb4e3e16ae3b33df67879d264373L26-R32)

topPRs.title: refactor: worker-plugin
topPRs.author: Neysixx
topPRs.body:
- Updated label elements in the RuleBuilder component to enhance readability by breaking long lines into multiple lines.
- Ensured consistent formatting for label attributes across different rule types, improving overall code clarity.

topContributors.summary: standujar: Primarily focused on feature development, notably contributing a substantial initial implementation to the Sendo Worker via PR #1 (+13194/-60 lines) and adding new projects to the leaderboard in PR #3, while also establishing comprehensive test infrastructure for the Sendo Worker in PR #2. Their work today involved significant code changes across various areas, with a primary focus on other work, tests, feature development, bug fixes, and refactoring.

Neysixx: Primarily focused on significant refactoring and new feature development within the `Sendo-labs/frontend` repository, merging two substantial pull requests including a new pages feature (PR #7) and a worker-plugin refactor (PR #6), demonstrating a focus on code modernization and expansion.
